pr_title: RDM-8606 Implement Add Case-Assigned User and Role

timeline.message:
RDM-8606 Implement Add Case-Assigned User and Role

   [RDM-8606](https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RDM-8606)

First cut of code for draft PR without tests which are still in progress

RDM-8606 Tests for Add Case-Assigned User and Role

   [RDM-8606](https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RDM-8606)

Merge branch 'RDM-8606-from-8344' into RDM-8606

Conflicts:
	src/main/java/uk/gov/hmcts/ccd/v2/external/resource/CaseAssignedUserRolesResource.java
	src/main/resources/application.properties
	src/test/java/uk/gov/hmcts/ccd/v2/external/controller/CaseAssignedUserRolesControllerIT.java

RDM-8606 accommodate OIDC changes to service name

   [RDM-8606](https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RDM-8606)

Changes to retrieval of client service name after OIDC changes:-
* Read service name directly from S2S Token,
* Revert CaseAssignedUserRoleValidator code.

RDM-8606 lookup case ID when adding case-user-role

   [RDM-8606](https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RDM-8606)

Convert case reference to case ID when adding a case-use-role.

RDM-8606 add Log Audit to get case-user-roles

   [RDM-8606](https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RDM-8606)

Add LogAudit config to getCaseUserRoles.

RDM-8606 Minor updates for Sonar and Swagger

   [RDM-8606](https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RDM-8606)

* Address SonarCloud issues reported against tests.
* Add NotFound scenario to add case-user-roles swagger config.

RDM-8606 Minor updates for Sonar

   [RDM-8606](https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RDM-8606)

Address SonarCloud issues reported against tests.

RDM-8606 Minor updates for Swagger

   [RDM-8606](https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RDM-8606)

Add standard 401/403 scenarios to add case-user-roles swagger config.
Merge branch 'develop' into RDM-8606

timeline.author: MSancaktutar

timeline.bodyText: Calling caseDetailsRepository.findByReference again and again for every distinct case reference may not be performant enough in for a call sending case role assignments for many distinct cases, but as per the current non-functional requirements, we can still accept this.
timeline.author: MSancaktutar

timeline.message:

   [RDM-8606](https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RDM-8606)

Use 201:CREATED HTTP status for success calls to add case-user-roles.
